name: NonEssentialHypertensionICD9CM
title: Non essential Hypertension ICD9CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains terms defining non-essential hypertension.),(Data Element Scope: This value set intends to identify patients with a diagnosis of non-essential hypertension.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hypertension due to another medical condition, (e.g. heart disease, or chronic kidney disease, pregnancy).),(Exclusion Criteria: Essential, primary hypertension, or transient hypertension (e.g. gestational hypertension).)
